name: Elincia
insights: Elincia is the only hero with Cloud Maiougi+.
Elincia is the only hero with Cloud Maiougi.
Elincia is the only hero with Rockslide Dance 2.
Elincia is the only hero with Rockslide Dance 1.
Elincia has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible in Fire Emblem Heroes.
Elincia has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Infantry heroes.
Elincia has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Dagger heroes.
Elincia has the lowest <abbr title="Base Stat Total">BST</abbr> potential possible among Green heroes.
description: The princess of Crimea who cares for her kingdom and people. It pleases her to see the smiling dancers at the summer festival. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

dialogue.text: I am Elincia, daughter of King Ramon of Crimea. Hm? My outfit comes as a surprise to you? This is actually sacred garb for a festival.
This yukata is so easy to move in, not to mention nice and cool. But... Do you happen to know if I'm wearing it properly?
One day, I hope to hold a festival just like this in Crimea. One that will bring everyone together in joy.
What is it that starts war? Perhaps it all stems from a fear of different cultures or ways of thinking...
I've never danced a foreign dance before. Its moves are so unique. But I'm still not quite getting them right... Would you mind practicing with me?
My father was troubled endlessly by how baseless assumptions can lead to discrimination against other lands. I'm certain there is a role I can play to end such atrocities as well...
I come with an invitation to the summer festival from my lord <Friend Name>.
It seems my training has borne fruit. I feel so accomplished!
I think I'm finally getting used to this dance's motions.
Perhaps I'm still too self- conscious about this dance...
Thank you for this. I'll do all I can to help you.

Have you taken time to look upon the smiling faces of those participating in the summer festival? What we should fight to protect is not history or kingdoms but those smiling citizens. Taking part in this festival, having the chance to dance with everyone, has reaffirmed my resolve to fight. I know not what storms may come in the future, but I'll never hesitate to raise my weapon for my people. Once peace has been restored, let's dance together again. Hand in hand, my lord <Player Name>.
